Have Moat or Magus of the Moat on the battlefield.

Animate a Blinkmoth/Inkmoth nexus, or give a non-flying creature flying.

author: [ShawnieBoyUK](https://code.google.com/u/ShawnieBoyUK/)
title: Moat abilities and gaining Flying
content:
_From [ShawnieBoyUK](https://code.google.com/u/ShawnieBoyUK/) on July 22, 2014 07:50:46_

Have Moat or Magus of the Moat on the battlefield.

Animate a Blinkmoth/Inkmoth nexus, or give a non-flying creature flying.

Expect the flying creature to be able to attack, however still can't. http://www.slightlymagic.net/forum/viewtopic.php?f=82&t=3735&start=660#p156167 Reported by Muppet on forums

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=623_
